items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any user, all other users see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a manual refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent active users without performance degradation.

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow teams to create and manage shared boards for organizing tasks by project.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a new shared board and invite team members.
All invited members can add, edit, and move tasks within the board.
non_functional: Board load time must be under 3 seconds.
Support up to 500 tasks per board without performance degradation.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards. Additional features like chat, notifications, and file sharing may be considered in future iterations.
